name: DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - WAP applied for & TMP written and approved
WHEN/HOW OFTEN - Prior to work starting

RECORD REQUIRED OR SIGN AND DATE WHEN COMPLETED - Approved documents received
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Hazards identified SSSP and EMP written and approved
WHEN/HOW OFTEN - Prior to work starting
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Approved by Engineer / Approved document on site.
RECORD REQUIRED OR SIGN AND DATE WHEN COMPLETED - NTC from Engineer
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Order Pipe & fittings for project
WHEN/HOW OFTEN - Prior to work starting
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Materials on approved materials list
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - B4U Dig request made
WHEN/HOW OFTEN - Prior to work starting
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Plans of all services received
RECORD REQUIRED OR SIGN AND DATE WHEN COMPLETED - Plans on site
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Deliver work notification letters to affected parties in and around work area.
WHEN/HOW OFTEN - 5 days before work starts
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Delivered to affected parties
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - SSSP and EMP Implemented
RECORD REQUIRED OR SIGN AND DATE WHEN COMPLETED - Tool box, Daily Pre-start
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - As per approved TMP

DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Record original condition of site and surroundings
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Date stamped with location phots and videos
RECORD REQUIRED OR SIGN AND DATE WHEN COMPLETED - Site condition record + video's and photo's
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Delivery of pipe to worksite
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Meets specification, quanity as per delivery docket, no defects.
COMMENTS - delivery docket checked and givewn to accounts, all pipe ends capped.
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Receiving materials for fittings etc
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Meets specification, quanity as per delivery docket, no defects.
COMMENTS - delivery docket checked and givewn to accounts.
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Weld pipe strings
RECORD REQUIRED OR SIGN AND DATE WHEN COMPLETED - Data report from welding machine
COMMENTS - Welder to ensure project details are entered into welder.
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Butt Weld(s) removed and sent to lab for testing
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - As per ISO 13953
RECORD REQUIRED OR SIGN AND DATE WHEN COMPLETED - Opus Test Report
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Mark out of underground Services
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Marks match plans
RECORD REQUIRED OR SIGN AND DATE WHEN COMPLETED - Video/Photo Record
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Services located by hydrovacing and pot holing
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - All known services located

COMMENTS - Any existing damage to services notified to engineer.
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Allignment of new pipeline confirmed with Engineer
RECORD REQUIRED OR SIGN AND DATE WHEN COMPLETED - NTC from Engineer
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Plan drill shots to install pipeline
RECORD REQUIRED OR SIGN AND DATE WHEN COMPLETED - Marked on Plan
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Pipe installed by directional drilling or open cut with tracer wire
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Installed as per Contract spec 2.57 & 2.58 & Engineering Code of Practice
RECORD REQUIRED OR SIGN AND DATE WHEN COMPLETED - IC201 - Pipe laying -Directional Drilling
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Accidental discovery of an archilogical site
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Refer to 1.16.16 for protocols.
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Join strings with EF Couplers, join tracer wire
RECORD REQUIRED OR SIGN AND DATE WHEN COMPLETED - IC202 - Electrofusion Weld

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Pass weld test
RECORD REQUIRED OR SIGN AND DATE WHEN COMPLETED - Opus Test
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Install Valves & Hydrants on new pipeline

RECORD REQUIRED OR SIGN AND DATE WHEN COMPLETED - CI 204 Valve/Hydrant
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Install new lot connections to pipeline
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Installed as per Engineering Code of Practice
RECORD REQUIRED OR SIGN AND DATE WHEN COMPLETED - CI 203 Lot connection detail
DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Pressure test new pipeline and fittings
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA/SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Succesful bounce test m7 or reference test m5

DETAIL OF ACTIVITY - Pig all lines
